item.description:
Lets go on a self guided walking tour of downtown Manchester and the Amoskeag Millyard.

Our first stop will be lunch at JD's Tavern. JD's Tavern is across the street from the Verizon Wireless Arena at the Center of NH, Radisson Hotel. There is a very reasonably priced parking garage right there. A web site I found described it as:

Eclectic pub menu as well as a fun time is served up in a comfortable mill-like setting for lunch or dinner. From light fare to full entrées. No smoking. Entrées from $12 - $17.

http://www.cnhparking...

Afterward, we will go on a stroll through history. There are two possibilities:

Tour 1 - The Millyard
Total Mileage: 2.41 miles w/o loop; 3.`6 miles with loop
Total time without stops : 1.5 hours
Key stops:
1. Millyard Museum - 30-50 minutes
2. Jefferson Mill - 15 minutes
3. Falls Overlook - 15 minutes
4. PSNH Lobby - 20 minutes
5. City Hall - 20 minutes

Tour 2 - Hanover Street and Victory Oark
Total mileage: 1.32 miles
Total time without stops: 50 minutes
Key stops may include:
1. City Hall - 20 minutes
2. NH Institute of Art - 20 minutes
3. Manchester Library - 10 minutes
4. Manchester Historic Assoc - 15 minutes
5. Franco-American Centre - 15 Mintes

I'm thinking we start with the first tour and see how it goes. Then we can call it quits or do the second tour. Notice the las stop of tour 1 is the first in tour 2.

Parking: Public parking garage and on-street parking

Nashua Car Pool: We will be leaving the Exit 6 Welcome Center at 11:45 AM. Look for Robert.
item.name: Lunch at JD's Tavern/Manchester Walking Tour
